item.title: Buy hard assets such as gold ahead of a potential bond market panic, says Bear Traps' Larry McDonald
item.description: New issuance of government debt later this year could put downward pressure on bond prices and boost commodities, McDonald said on "Squawk Box."

item.title: Wall Street's 'fear gauge' just experienced its third-biggest decline ever. What it means going forward
item.description: Investors who are willing to be patient following this drop in the CBOE Volatility Index could be rewarded.

item.title: What to make of Apple's developers conference and a potential winner from U.S.-China trade talks
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: Op-Ed: Wall Street needs to develop its own AI systems, not rely on Big Tech
item.description: TFIN's Dr. Vinay Nair says the world of finance is facing an AI day of reckoning.

item.title: Disney gets a price target increase from Loop Capital as media giant gains full control of Hulu
item.description: Walt Disney will pay Comcast an additional $438.7 million to finalize its purchase of streaming service Hulu.
